title: Design and Development of Multipurpose Data Acquisition for Effective Transportation
abstract: The most pressing problem in contemporary cities is traffic. In order to offer people with efficient, quiet driving and a life free of pollutants, traffic regulation becomes more essential. The work is intended to create a system in which all modules are connected to a single control unit that can control, detect, and report any system faults as well as to develop a single module that can improve the efficiency of vehicle transportation on roads, control energy-efficient LED street lights, and design a module that can detect emergency vehicles and alert other vehicles on the road so that emergency vehicles can arrive at their destination in time.
venue: 2023 9th International Conference on Advanced Computing and Communication Systems (ICACCS)

journal.name: 2023 9th International Conference on Advanced Computing and Communication Systems (ICACCS)
